rightValue.stringValue: I am currently under debt review
I am currently under sequestration in terms of a court order

rules.name: Married_COP_Co_App_Poor_Credit
rules.label: Married COP - Co App Poor Credit

Flow.description:
DB: 10 aug
Flow Description: Flow to Convert General op to Pre-Approval Opp, launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 (main flow that houses entire skeleton of working opps)
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paIdOppVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

Flow.label: Convert to Pre-Approval Subflow

fields.name: missingDocsVerification
fields.fieldText: You have not uploaded all of the minimum required documents needed to Mark as Ready for Verification:

fields.name: closedPoorCred
fields.fieldText:
The Opportunity stage for {!Get_Updated_PA_Opp_Post_Consent.Name} has been updated to Closed Lost:


Status: Poor Credit

Credit Check Result: Red

fields.name: redCredit
fields.fieldText:
Due to the marital agreement and credit check result of the Co Applicant, the Opportunity stage for {!Get_Updated_Closed_Opp.Name} has been updated to Closed Lost:


Marital Agreement: Married in Community of Property (COP)

Status: Poor Credit

Credit Check Result: Red

fields.name: runConsentAgain_0
fields.fieldText: Run Consent, IDV and Credit check for another Applicant or click on Continue:
